code: import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Container from'react-bootstrap/Container';import Form from'react-bootstrap/Form';import Nav from'react-bootstrap/Nav';import Navbar from'react-bootstrap/Navbar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavScrollExample(_ref){let{onSearch}=_ref;const filterBySearch=word=>{onSearch(word);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{expand:"lg",className:"bg-body-tertiary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{href:"/",children:"Watch It"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"navbarScroll"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar.Collapse,{id:"navbarScroll",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{className:"me-auto my-2 my-lg-0",style:{maxHeight:'100px'},navbarScroll:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Search",className:"me-2","aria-label":"Search",onChange:e=>filterBySearch(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-success",children:"Search"})]})]})]})});}export default NavScrollExample;
